Chained Reactions: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.
Explosive Frags: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.
Exquisite Compound: Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Sparkly Explosion: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.
Nova Burst: Increases the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Blazing Delight: While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s. When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.
